titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry star Pee Wee King at Arizona-Oklahoma Livestock Show

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) Hatch poster announcing the Grand Ole Opry stars Pee Wee King, Johnny Western, Redd Stewart, Collins Sisters, and Larry Good at the Arkansas-Oklahoma Livestock Show on September 25. Poster features metal photoplates of the Pee Wee King, Johnny Western, Redd Stewart, Collins Sisters, and Larry Good.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
